title: Fort Smith National Historic Site: Video
body: Video       The Fort Smith National Historic Site produces several short videos per year, and we are proud to offer them free-of-charge to you. Any questions or comments can be sent here.                             Building the Diorama A short narrative video demonstrating the steps taken to build the diorama depicting the Battle at Devil's Backbone.  Duration:1 minute, 34 seconds                                Battle at Devil's Backbone History A short narrative of the Battle at Devil's Backbone as perceived from both the Union and the Confederate points-of-view.  Duration:3 minutes, 21 seconds                                Uniforms and Firearms of the Civil War An interpretive discussion of the uniforms and firearms used by Civil War soldiers by Rangers Cody Faber and Derek Wright.  Duration:2 minutes, 29 seconds
